message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value, potentially exceeding $1000000. While I can't disclose the specifics just yet, I'm confident it will be of great benefit to you.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This price reflects the potential upside and allows for a healthy margin for both of us. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
